Title: Soodhu Kavvum
Writer: Srinivas Kavinayam, Srinivasa Kavineyam, Srinivasa Kavineyam, Nalan Kumarasamy, Nalan Kumarasamy
Actors: Vijay Sethupathi, Sanchita Shetty, Radha Ravi, M.S. Bhaskar
Plot: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.
